snippet: The high commissioner for human rights reprimanded Tajikistan for its crackdown on the only genuine opposition party in the country.
abstract: Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe admonishes Tajikistan's government for crackdown on Islamic Renaissance Party of Tajikistan, calling government's moves against only genuine opposition party in country a violation of human rights law.
lead_paragraph: The high commissioner for human rights reprimanded Tajikistan for its crackdown on the only genuine opposition party in the country.

headline.main: Tajikistan: U.N. Agency Rebukes Government Over Crackdown on Opposition Party
headline.print_headline: Asia; Tajikistan: European Security Group Issues Rebuke Over Government’s Crackdown on Opposition Party

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations

keywords.value: Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe
